io.github.medjed.jsonpathcompiler.expressions

インタフェース EvaluationContext

  • 既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    EvaluationContextImpl

    public interface EvaluationContext

    • メソッドのサマリー

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      Configuration configuration() 
      <T> T getPath()
      Returns the list of formalized paths that represent the result of the evaluation
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPathList()
      Convenience method to get list of hits as String path representations
      <T> T getValue()
      This method does not adhere to configuration settings.
      <T> T getValue(boolean unwrap)
      See getValue()
      java.lang.Object rootDocument()
      The json document that is evaluated
      java.util.Collection<PathRef> updateOperations() 

    • メソッドの詳細

      • configuration

        Configuration configuration()
        戻り値:
        the configuration used for this evaluation

      • rootDocument

        java.lang.Object rootDocument()
        The json document that is evaluated
        戻り値:
        the document

      • getValue

        <T> T getValue()
        This method does not adhere to configuration settings. It will return a single object (not wrapped in a List) even if the configuration contains the Option.ALWAYS_RETURN_LIST
        型パラメータ:
        T - expected return type
        戻り値:
        evaluation result

      • getValue

        <T> T getValue(boolean unwrap)
        See getValue()
        型パラメータ:
        T - expected return type
        パラメータ:
        unwrap - tells th underlying json provider if primitives should be unwrapped
        戻り値:
        evaluation result

      • getPath

        <T> T getPath()
        Returns the list of formalized paths that represent the result of the evaluation
        型パラメータ:
        T -
        戻り値:
        list of paths

      • getPathList

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPathList()
        Convenience method to get list of hits as String path representations
        戻り値:
        list of path representations

      • updateOperations

        java.util.Collection<PathRef> updateOperations()
